<br>

 

<p>We will welcome the Head of Helmholtz Open Science Office, Dr. Mathijs Vleugel, to present the Helmholtz open science strategy and the activities of his office. This will be followed by discussions about possible strategies that can be implemented at the LMU.</p><p>The meeting can be followed by the LMU Open Science Center’s annual member’s meeting. All invited.</p><div class="g-clear"></div>
